name: Sh'PONG
description:
This is my take on the classic PONG game;

I really liked it as a kid and I think it's a good practice to make such a game.

Controls (keyboard or controllers):
player1: wasd/controller1
player2: arrow keys/controller2

P  - pause
M - mute music
R - restart game
T - toggle train mode

If you are not familiar with PONG, this game is made for 2 players playing on the same keyboard or controllers on one PC.

The game is recommended to play on fullscreen mode and with speakers on.
